arm_group.arm_group_label: Do not perform coronary CT angiography

brief_summary.textblock:
The CRONOS-ADM (Coronary CT angiography evaluation for clinical outcomes in asymptomatic
      patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus) registry is a large, prospective observational
      registry of demographic, clinical and laboratory data with long-term clinical outcome of
      asymptomatic diabetic patients without history of CAD or angina or angina-equivalent
      symptoms at two affiliated hospitals of The Catholic University of Korea.

condition: Asymptomatic Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Age > 18 years

          2. Asymptomatic type 2 diabetes mellitus

          3. Prospective data collection for CAD risk factors

study_pop.textblock:
The study population consist of patients with asymptomatic type 2 diabetes mellitus at two
        centers of catholic university of Korea

clinical_study.official_title: Coronary CT Angiography Evaluation for Clinical Outcomes in Asymptomatic Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to median 3 years follow up

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
